programs.features: APA-accredited, strong emphasis on applied practice and cultural competency
programs.purpose: Prepare psychologists to address mental health from a lifespan and trauma-informed lens

programs.focus: Generalist training with trauma exposure in clinical practicum
programs.features: Focus on individual and group interventions, diversity, and vocational development
programs.purpose: Prepares licensed psychologists with training that includes trauma and lifespan development

programs.program: Master of Education (M.Ed.) in Counselor Education
programs.focus: Counseling for educational, health, and community settings
programs.features: Prepares for LPC certification, opportunities in higher education advising and career counseling
programs.purpose: Provides foundational counseling skills for practice in school and community settings

programs.program: Master of Arts in Professional Counseling
programs.focus: Mental health, family, and school-based counseling
programs.features: 60 credit hours, CACREP accredited, prepares for LPC licensure, hybrid format
programs.purpose: Prepares graduates for licensure and clinical counseling practice

programs.program: Ph.D. in Clinical Psychology with Trauma Emphasis
programs.focus: Childhood trauma, PTSD, trauma across the lifespan
programs.features: Veterans Health and Trauma Clinic, hands-on trauma research, clinical internships
programs.purpose: Doctoral-level training in clinical psychology with trauma emphasis

programs.features: Strong emphasis on research design, statistics, and faculty-led research experience
programs.purpose: Designed for students who need research experience before applying to Ph.D. programs

programs.focus: Counseling Psychology Ph.D. programs may be slightly less competitive than Clinical Psychology Ph.D. programs, depending on the institution.
programs.features: Often value strengths-based, multicultural, and lifespan-oriented training; tend to attract applicants interested in trauma-informed and developmentally rooted therapy work
programs.purpose: Encouragement and advice for students transitioning from unrelated undergrad degrees into psychology graduate programs
